doors.name: BHFD
doors.title: FRONT DOOR
doors.description: A BIG RED DOOR WITH A GOLDEN KNOCKER AND 3 CURVED WINDOWS AT THE TOP.
doors.knock: YOU HERE A MUFFLED VOICE FROM THE OTHERSIDE "ONE MINUTE!"

paths.description: A BIG RED DOOR THAT LEADS BACK OUT TO THE PORCH.

doors.name: PROJECTION BOOTH DOOR
doors.description: A GRAY METAL DOOR WITH SOME NAUGHTY PIN-UPS TAPED TO IT.

paths.description: A GRAY METAL DOOR WITH A SIGN THAT SAYS "STAFF ONLY" TAPED TO IT.
paths.locked_message: THERE'S A SIGN THAT SAYS "STAFF ONLY". YOU'RE DEFINITELY NOT STAFF SO YOU DECIDE IT'S BEST TO NOT GO THAT WAY.
